text: Hi all, I have a dynamic HubDB page containing a form. This form needs to pass the URL (of the dynamic page) as a parameter. My solution was to use a custom module to embed the HubSpot form and call the onFormSubmit function coupled with a window.location.href. But it still doesn't work. Could it be a dynamic template constraint, or an issue with my code?
The variables show up in console.log btw - but don't save on the contact's property.
